title: KPWE Susan Szpyrka Scholarship Fund
description: To provide a scholarship named in honor of Susan Szpyrka to be awarded in accordance with procedures currently in place for the KPWE Scholarship Program at UCCS.
marketingContent: To provide a scholarship named in honor of Susan Szpyrka to be awarded in accordance with procedures currently in place for the KPWE Scholarship Program at UCCS. Funds in excess of $5,000 may be used for regular KPWE scholarships.
